conversations.body_text: Hi Javier Checa,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?

yes, all perfect, thank you

El jue, 15 ene 2026, 10:20, service@simsonn.com
Hi Javier Checa,    Great to hear the good news—have fun!
